title.narrative: SOCIAL INCLUSION

description.narrative: Emergency response in the social inclusion area, which contributes to Access To Inclusive Social Protection, Access To Inclusive Social Protection (Covid). UNICEF aims to achieve this through Systems Strengthening And Institution Building, Systems Strengthening To Leave No One Behind. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: New Element

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Emergency response in the social inclusion area

description.narrative: UNICEF country office contributed bringing a child lens analysis to the fore and raising awareness of the multiple impacts that the COVID-19 crisis has had on the lives of children, adolescents and their families. This has been achieved through development of the regular ENCOVID telephone surveys and providing assistance based on survey response. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:18/01/2022
